summary.span: 做為所有健康監視錯誤事件的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all the health-monitoring error events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別是健全狀況監視的事件，以表示錯誤狀況的基底類別。The class is the base class for the health-monitoring events that represent error conditions. ASP.NET 會使用和其衍生的類型，來指出錯誤情況的 Web 應用程式的存留期間。ASP.NET uses and its derived types to indicate error conditions during the lifetime of a Web application. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，實作，而您會藉由指定的值來控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例有兩個部分。The following code example has two parts. 第一個是摘錄自組態檔，可讓 ASP.NET 健康監視使用衍生自事件類別。The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET health monitoring to use an event derived from the class. 第二個示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的事件。The second shows how to derive from the class to create the custom event. ``` ``` 下列程式碼會示範如何從衍生類別來建立自訂的事件。The following code shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. summary.span: 遞增事件錯誤效能相關的計數器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會下列效能計數器：This method increments the following performance counters: - 基礎結構引發的錯誤事件。Infrastructure Error Events Raised. 這是全域的計數器可追蹤引發的錯誤事件。This is a global counter that tracks the error events raised. - 引發的錯誤事件。Error Events Raised. 這是應用程式特定的計數器可追蹤應用程式啟動後所引發的錯誤事件的數目。This is an application-specific counter that tracks the number of error events raised since the application started. 這個方法也會呼叫父，其中累加引發事件的計數器。This method also calls the parent , which increments the Events Raised counter. 這個計數器會追蹤所引發的事件總數。This counter tracks the total number of events raised. 若要檢視在 [系統監視器 (PerfMon)，這些效能計數器中**新增計數器**視窗選取**ASP.NET**中**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取您想要檢視，然後按一下效能計數器**新增**] 按鈕。To view these performance counters in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the performance counter you want to view, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上的 IIS 文件。For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) in the IIS documentation on MSDN.
